home.heroDescription: Discover thousands of delicious and budget-friendly recipes. Healthy, fast, and cheap.

about.description: Our mission is simple: to help everyone cook delicious, affordable meals by breaking down language barriers with artificial intelligence.
about.budgetFriendlyDesc: We curate the best low-cost recipes from the web to watch your wallet.
about.noBarriersDesc: We translate ingredients and measurements so you can cook without confusion.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataCollection: We do not collect personal data. Searches are processed in real-time using the Gemini API and are not permanently stored on our servers.
privacy.cookies: We use local storage only to save your language preferences and favorite recipes temporarily.
privacy.thirdPartyServices: This site uses third-party services to process content. By using this service, you agree to our terms of service.
privacy.agreement: By using Sabores Económicos, you agree to these terms.
